title: PROJECT SMOKE: SEVEN STEPS TO SMOKED FOOD NIRVANA
author: Steven Raichlen
description: A complete, step-by-step guide to mastering the art and craft of smoking, plus 100 recipes—every one a game-changer –for smoked food that roars off your plate with flavor.

title: KITCHEN PARTY: EFFORTLESS RECIPES FOR EVERY OCCASION
author: Mary Berg
description: Mary Berg--winner of MasterChef Canada and star of Mary's Kitchen Crush--shares her most delicious, stress-free recipes, grand enough for special celebrations and easy enough for a regular Tuesday night.

title: FARM TO CHEF: COOKING THROUGH THE SEASONS
author: Lynn Crawford
description: Bestselling author and acclaimed chef Lynn Crawford celebrates the bounty of the seasons with over 140 recipes featuring farm-fresh produce for every occasion
